General.Name: Enlighta Inc
General.Description: Enlighta Inc., a development stage company, operates as a healthcare and medical digital, green, and clean technology company. The company was formerly known as HooXi Network Inc. and changed its name to Enlighta Inc. in July 2019. Enlighta Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Road Town, the British Virgin Islands.
General.Address: 30 DeCastro Street, Road Town, British Virgin Islands
